displayName.italian: C'è ancora un po' di spazio all'inferno

description.english: 100% Complete! Unlock all original achievements shipped with Steam release! Thanks for playing!
description.schinese: 成功解锁在Steam发行时的所有原始成就，达到100%完成度，感谢您的游玩！
description.spanish: ¡100% Completado! ¡Obtén todos los logros originales de la versión de Steam! ¡Gracias por jugar!
description.tchinese: 完成 100%！解鎖所有遊戲登錄 Steam 時的原始成就！感謝支持！
description.brazilian: 100% Completo! Desbloqueie todas as conquistas originais enviadas com o lançamento do Steam! Obrigado por jogar!
description.russian: 100% завершение! Разблокируйте все оригинальные достижения, доступные с выпуском в Steam! Спасибо за игру!
description.french: Complété à 100% ! Débloquer tous les succès originaux de la sortie Steam ! Merci d'avoir joué !
description.italian: Completato al 100%! Sblocca tutti gli achievement originali usciti con il rilascio su Steam! Grazie per aver giocato!

description.english: Complete any level without killing a zombie and taking damage
description.schinese: 在不击杀丧尸也不受到伤害的前提下，通关任意地图。
description.spanish: Completa exitosamente cualquier nivel sin matar zombis ni recibir daño
description.tchinese: 在不殺死殭屍也不受到傷害的情況下完成任一關卡
description.brazilian: Complete com Sucesso qualquer mapa sem matar um zumbi ou sofrer dano
description.russian: Пройдите любой уровень, не убив зомби и не получив урона
description.french: Terminer avec succès n'importe quel niveau sans tuer de zombie ni prendre de dégât
description.italian: Completa un livello qualsiasi senza uccidere zombi e subire danni

description.english: Complete the following maps with AT LEAST 6 players without losing a single safe zone or incurring any casualties: Favela, Northway, Flooded, Isolated, NotLD, Ransack
description.schinese: 在满足至少6名玩家的前提下，成功通关以下地图：Favela、Northway、Flooded、Isolated、NotLD、Ransack，并且不允许失守任何安全区以及任何人员死亡。
description.spanish: Completa los siguientes mapas con POR LO MENOS 6 jugadores sin perder ninguna zona segura ni sufrir muertes: Favela, Northway, Flooded, Isolated, NotLD, Ransack
description.tchinese: 至少 6 名玩家在不失去任何安全區且毫無傷亡的條件下完成以下關卡：Favela, Northway, Flooded, Isolated, NotLD, Ransack
description.brazilian: Complete os seguintes mapas com PELO MENOS 6 jogadores sem perder uma única zona segura ou sofrer baixas: Favela, Northway, Flooded, Isolated, NotLD, Ransack
description.russian: Пройдите следующие карты с участием НЕ МЕНЕЕ 6 игроков, не потеряв ни одной безопасной зоны и не понеся потерь: Favela, Northway, Flooded, Isolated, NotLD, Ransack
description.french: Terminer les cartes suivantes avec AU MOINS 6 joueurs sans perdre de zone sûre ni subir de perte humaine : Favela, Northway, Flooded, Isolated, NotLD, Ransack
description.italian: Completa le seguenti mappe con ALMENO 6 giocatori senza perdere una sola zona sicura o subire perdite: Favela, Northway, Flooded, Isolated, NotLD, Ransack

displayName.italian: Una pazza giornata a New York

description.schinese: 成功解锁"派对已毕"，"尖峰时刻"和"映前熄灯"三个成就。
description.spanish: Obtén "La Fiesta Ha Terminado," "HoraPico," y "Fuera Luces"
description.tchinese: 解鎖「狂歡結束」、「尖峰時刻」與「熄燈」成就
description.russian: Разблокировать достижения «Вечеринка окончена», «Час пик» и «Света нет»
description.french: Débloquer "La Fête est Finie", "Heure de Pointe" et "Extinction des Feux"
description.italian: Sblocca gli achievement "La festa è finita", "Ora di punta" e "Via le luci"

description.schinese: 在5.5分钟或更短时间内成功通关地图Cabin。

description.tchinese: 在 5.5 分鐘內完成 Cabin

description.russian: Пройдите Cabin за 5,5 минут или меньше
description.french: Terminer Cabin en 5,5 minutes ou moins
description.italian: Completa Cabin in 5,5 minuti o meno

description.english: Kill a zombie from 125+ feet with the bow
description.schinese: 使用复合弓在125+英尺开外射杀一只丧尸。
description.spanish: Mata cualquier enemigo (Zombi o Guardia Nacional) desde 125+ pies con el arco
description.tchinese: 在 125 碼以上的距離用弓箭殺死任何敵人(殭屍或國民警衛隊)
description.brazilian: Mate qualquer inimigo (Zumbi ou Guarda Nacional) a mais de 125 pés com o arco
description.russian: Убейте врага с расстояния 125+ футов из лука
description.french: Tuer n'importe quel ennemi (Zombie ou Garde National) depuis au moins 38.1 mètres avec l'arc
description.italian: Uccidi uno Zombi ad una distanza di 40 metri con l'arco

description.english: Stick 10 arrows in 10 different zombies while they still walk
description.schinese: 在10只不同的丧尸身上插满10支箭，且保证它们依然能够正常行走。
description.spanish: Inserta 10 flechas en 10 zombis diferentes mientras caminan todavía
description.tchinese: 在 10 個還在行走的殭屍身上插上 10 枝箭失
description.brazilian: Enfie 10 flechas em 10 zumbis diferentes enquanto eles ainda andam
description.russian: Всадите 10 стрел в 10 разных зомби, пока они ещё ходят
description.french: Coller 10 flèches dans 10 zombies différents pendant qu'ils marchent encore
description.italian: Infila 10 frecce in 10 zombi diversi mentre camminano ancora

description.english: In one life, take four bottles of pills to stave off a really bad case of death
description.schinese: 在一条命中，累计服用4瓶药片来延迟您感染的病毒发作。
description.spanish: En una sola vida, toma cuatro botellas de pastillas para retrasar un caso grave de muerte
description.tchinese: 在一條命中，嗑掉整整四罐膠囊來苟延殘喘下去
description.brazilian: Em uma vida, tome quatro frascos de pílulas para evitar um caso muito grave de morte
description.russian: За одну жизнь принять четыре бутылки таблеток, чтобы предотвратить самый тяжёлый случай смерти
description.french: En une vie, consommer quatre boîtes de pillules pour esquiver un bon gros décès
description.italian: In una vita, prendi quattro flaconi di pillole per evitare un gravissimo caso di morte acuta

description.english: Help a fellow survivor who is infected find peace.
description.schinese: "帮助"一名感染丧尸病毒的队友寻求安息。
description.spanish: Ayuda a otro superviviente a encontrar la paz.
description.tchinese: 幫助一名慘遭感染的同伴尋得安寧。
description.brazilian: Ajude um colega sobrevivente infectado a encontrar a paz.
description.french: Aidez un compagnon survivant infecté à trouver la paix.
description.italian: Aiuta un altro sopravvissuto infetto a trovare la pace.

description.english: You can never be too sure that your new gun is loaded with a full magazine
description.schinese: 永远怀疑自己新获得的枪支内是否装有填满的弹匣。
description.spanish: Nunca puedes estar seguro que tu arma nueva está cargada
description.tchinese: 你永遠無法保證槍已上膛裝有彈匣。
description.brazilian: Você nunca pode ter certeza de que sua nova arma está carregada com um pente completo
description.russian: Вы никогда не можете быть слишком уверены в том, что ваш новый пистолет полностью заряжен.
description.french: On n'est jamais assez certain du fait que notre nouveau flingue ait un chargeur plein
description.italian: Non si è mai troppo sicuri che la nuova pistola sia caricata con un caricatore pieno.

description.english: We stick together. Follow the community hub for No More Room in Hell
description.schinese: 同生死共患难，在Steam社区中心内关注地狱已满的官方群组。
description.spanish: Nos mantenemos unidos. Sigue el punto de encuentro de No More Room in Hell en Steam
description.tchinese: 結伴作伙，追蹤 No More Room in Hell 的社群中心
description.brazilian: Nós ficamos juntos. Siga o hub da comunidade No More Room in Hell
description.russian: Мы держимся вместе. Следите за центром сообщества по No More Room in Hell
description.french: On reste ensemble. Suivez le hub de la communauté de No More Room in Hell
description.italian: Restiamo uniti. Segui l'hub della comunità di No More Room in Hell

description.english: You like a good challenge? Engage 1000 zombies in fisticuffs and win
description.schinese: 听说你喜欢挑战自己？仅使用拳头和1000只丧尸格斗并取得胜利！
description.spanish: ¿Te gusta un buen desafío? Entra en combate contra 1000 zombis con tus puños y gana
description.tchinese: 想來點挑戰嗎？去和 1000 個殭屍近身搏擊並獲得勝利
description.brazilian: Você gosta de um bom desafio? Envolva 1000 zumbis em socos e vença
description.russian: Вы любите хорошие испытания? Вступите в схватку с тысячей зомби и победите
description.french: Vous aimez les défis ? Engagez 1000 zombies en bagarre au poing, et gagnez
description.italian: Ti piacciono le sfide? Combatti 1000 zombi a scazzottate e vinci

displayName.english: But They Used to be People!

description.english: Complete Broadway, Chinatown, and Cabin without killing any Zombies
description.schinese: 在不击杀任何丧尸的前提下，通关Broadway、Chinatown和Cabin三张地图。
description.spanish: Completa Broadway, Chinatown y Cabin sin matar ningún zombi
description.tchinese: 在沒有殺死任何殭屍的情況下完成 Broadway、Chinatown 還有 Cabin
description.brazilian: Complete Broadway, Chinatown, e Cabin Sem Matar Nenhum Zumbi
description.russian: Пройдите Broadway, Chinatown и Cabin, не убив ни одного зомби
description.french: Terminer Broadway, Chinatown, et Cabin sans tuer de zombie
description.italian: Completa Broadway, Chinatown e Cabin senza uccidere Zombi

description.schinese: 使用砍刀击杀250只丧尸。
description.spanish: Causa 250 muertes con el Machete
description.tchinese: 使用開山刀拿下 250 殺

description.schinese: 使用TNT 炸药击杀250只丧尸。
description.spanish: Causa 250 muerte con el TNT
description.tchinese: 使用 TNT 拿下 250 殺
description.french: Faire 250 victimes avec de la TNT

displayName.brazilian: Uma Bebida para Acompanhar a Comida
displayName.french: Une Boisson Qui Va Avec le Plat
displayName.italian: Un drink da abbinare al cibo

description.tchinese: 使用莫勒托夫燃燒彈拿下 250 殺
description.brazilian: Consiga 250 mortes com o Coquetel Molotov
description.french: Faire 250 victimes avec le Molotov Cocktail

displayName.english: Right Arm of the Free World
displayName.spanish: El Brazo Derecho del Mundo Libre
displayName.french: Le Bras Droit du Monde Libre

description.english: Get 500 kills with the FN FAL
description.schinese: 使用FN FAL 自动步枪击杀500只丧尸。
description.spanish: Causa 500 muertes con el FN FAL
description.tchinese: 使用 FN FAL 拿下 500 殺
description.brazilian: Obtenha 500 mortes com a FN FAL
description.french: Faire 500 victimes avec le FN FAL
description.italian: Effettua 500 uccisioni con il FN FAL

description.english: Use 20 FEMA bags when zones are below 50%
description.schinese: 在生存地图的安全区维修值低于50%时，累计使用20个FEMA修理包。
description.spanish: Usa 20 bolsas de FEMA cuando una zona esté por debajo de 50% de vida
description.tchinese: 在區域低於 50% 時使用 20 個 FEMA 救災包
description.brazilian: Use 20 sacos FEMA quando as zonas estiverem abaixo de 50%
description.russian: Используйте 20 мешков FEMA, когда зоны ниже 50%
description.french: Utiliser 20 FEMA bags quand les zones sont en-dessous de 50%
description.italian: Usa 20 borse della FEMA quando le zone sono sotto il 50%

description.english: Kill 500 zombies with 6 or more players
description.schinese: 和至少6名或更多玩家共同击杀500只丧尸。
description.spanish: Mata 500 zombis con por lo menos 3 personas de tu lista de amigos en el servidor
description.tchinese: 與 6 名以上的玩家一同殺死 500 個殭屍
description.brazilian: Mate 500 zumbis com pelo menos 3 pessoas da sua lista de amigos no jogo com você
description.russian: Убейте 500 зомби вместе с 6 и более игроками
description.french: Tuer 500 zombies avec 6 joueurs ou plus
description.italian: Uccidi 500 zombi con almeno 6 giocatori in partita con te

displayName.brazilian: Tire as Mãos do Meu Homem
displayName.french: Vire tes Mains de Mon Pote
displayName.italian: Giù le mani dal mio uomo

description.english: Save another player who has been grabbed by a Zombie
description.schinese: 在另一名队友被丧尸抓住时拯救他。
description.spanish: Salva a otro jugador que ha sido agarrado por un zombi
description.tchinese: 拯救被殭屍逮到的玩家
description.brazilian: Salve outro jogador que foi agarrado por um Zumbi
description.russian: Спасти другого игрока, которого схватил зомби
description.french: Sauver un autre joueur qui a été attrapé par unZombie
description.italian: Salva un altro giocatore che è stato afferrato da uno Zombi

description.english: Earn a Respawn Token while infected
description.schinese: 在已经被丧尸感染的情况下获得重生点数。
description.spanish: Consigue un Token de Reaparición estando infectado
description.tchinese: 在遭受感染後爭取到一枚復活點數
description.brazilian: Ganhe um Ticket de Renascimento enquanto estiver infectado
description.russian: Заработайте жетон возрождения во время заражения
description.french: Gagner un jeton de réapparition en étant infecté
description.italian: Guadagna un Bonus Rientro da Infetto

description.english: Find and kill a watermelon with the Bow from 20 meters away
description.schinese: 找到一个西瓜后，从20米开外的地方使用复合弓将其射杀。
description.spanish: Encuentra y mata una sandía con el Arco a una distancia de 20 metros
description.tchinese: 找到一顆西瓜並在 20 公尺外使用弓箭將它殺掉
description.brazilian: Encontre e mate uma melancia com o Arco a 20 metros de distância
description.russian: Найдите и уничтожьте арбуз с помощью лука с расстояния 20 метров
description.french: Trouver et tuer une pastèque avec l'Arc à 20 mètres de distance
description.italian: Trova e uccidi un cocomero con l'arco da 20 metri di distanza

description.english: The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the one.
description.schinese: 多数人的需求比少数人的更重要，在被感染时履行您应尽的义务。
description.spanish: Las necesidades de la mayoría pesan más que las del individuo.
description.tchinese: 在公眾利益之前容不下一己之私。
description.brazilian: As necessidades de muitos superam as necessidades de um.
description.french: Les besoins du grand nombre sont plus importants que les besoins d'un seul individus.
description.italian: I bisogni dei molti superano quelli dei singoli.

displayName.italian: Due al prezzo di uno Pt. 1

description.english: Get 2 kills per 1 bullet from a whole mag of the Sako 85 without reloading
description.schinese: 在不重新换弹的情况下，使用Sako 85狙击枪做到弹匣内的每一发子弹都一击双杀。
description.spanish: Mata 2 zombis por cada bala de un cargador del Sako 85 completo sin recargar
description.tchinese: 不換彈匣的情況下使用沙可 85 的一整盒彈匣中的每一發子彈都造成雙殺
description.brazilian: Obtenha 2 mortes por 1 bala de um cartucho inteiro do Sako 85 sem recarregar
description.russian: Получите 2 убийства на 1 пулю из целой обоймы Зако 85 без перезарядки
description.french: Faire 2 victimes pour chaque balle d'un chargeur plein avec le Sako 85 sans recharger
description.italian: Ottieni 2 uccisioni per ogni proiettile da un intero caricatore del Sako 85 senza ricaricare

displayName.italian: Due al prezzo di uno Pt. 2

description.english: Get 2 kills per 1 bullet from a whole mag of the JAE-700 without reloading
description.schinese: 在不重新换弹的情况下，使用JAE-700狙击枪做到弹匣内的每一发子弹都一击双杀。
description.spanish: Mata 2 zombis por cada bala de un cargador del JAE-700 completo sin recargar
description.tchinese: 不換彈匣的情況下使用 JAE-700 的一整盒彈匣中的每一發子彈都造成雙殺
description.brazilian: Obtenha 2 mortes por 1 bala de um cartucho inteiro do JAE-700 sem recarregar
description.russian: Получите 2 убийства на 1 пулю из целой обоймы JAE-700 без перезарядки
description.french: Faire 2 victimes pour chaque balle d'un chargeur plein avec le JAE-700 sans recharger
description.italian: Ottieni 2 uccisioni per ogni proiettile da un intero caricatore del JAE-700 senza ricaricare

description.english: Kill yourself and 8 zombies with one explosive
description.schinese: 在一场爆炸中炸死你自己和8只丧尸。
description.spanish: Mátate junto a 8 zombis con un solo explosivo
description.tchinese: 用一枚爆裂物把自己與 8 個殭屍一併帶走
description.brazilian: Mate-se e leve 8 zumbis com um explosivo
description.russian: Убейте себя и 8 зомби одной взрывчаткой
description.italian: Uccidi te stesso e 8 zombi con un esplosione

description.english: Complete any objective map with 8 players alive
description.schinese: 在8名玩家全部生还的情况下，通关任意任务地图。

description.tchinese: 在 8 名玩家皆生還的情況下完成任何目標地圖

description.russian: Пройдите любую карту с заданиями с 8 живыми игроками
description.italian: Completa qualsiasi mappa obiettivo con 8 giocatori vivi

displayName.spanish: No Se Deja a Nadie Atrás
